alert.note: Alert for Kit Carson County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 7:24PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Kit Carson County through 800 PM MDT... At 723 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Flagler, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Seibert around 740 PM MDT. This includes Interstate 70 in Colorado between mile markers 392 and 407. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also possible with this storm and may lead to localized visibility reduction. Use extra caution while driving through this storm. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
